characterList: 襲兒舊寫瀉兩倆滿爾彌虛聯關那哪巫靈縣懸與舉腦惱專傳轉團黃廣橫窗總詹擔數樓獨屬爛蘭從縱齊濟丑扭卑牌號怪赤亦極雜曰

characters.story: This character represents to raid, asking "Shee, should we attack?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show youngster, asking "Urr? Son?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show old, shouting "Jyo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for to write that whispers "Shyeh" softly!
See how the water forms diarrhea? It shouts "Shyeh!" sharply!
A striking symbol for dos that whispers "Lyahng" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The person stands for duo, whispering "Lyah" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The water stands for full, whispering "Mahn" softly like ripples spreading across a pond!
The strokes unite to show you [literary], whispering "Urr" softly!
"Mee, is it full?" The bow questioned filling you curiously - more and more!
This character represents false, singing "Shyoo!" cheerfully!
"Lyan, should we join?" The ear questioned connection curiously - to unite as allies strung together!
"Gwahn!" The gate united cheerfully - time to shut, close, turn off the connection!
This character represents that, shouting "Nah!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Like a mouth, this character means which? and whispers "Nah"!
See how the person forms witch? It sings "Woo!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The rain stands for spirit, asking "Ling? Soul?" curiously - a vivid image to remember!
When the thread meets the eye, they form county, shouting "Shyan!" sharply!
The heart stands for to suspend, asking "Shyuan, is it hanging?" curiously!
A striking symbol for to offer that whispers "Yoo" softly - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents to lift up, whispering "Jyoo" softly!
The body takes the shape of brain, whispering "Nao" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Like a heart, this character means annoyed and whispers "Nao"!
A striking symbol for specialty that sings "Jwahn!" cheerfully!
"Chwahn, will it infect?" The person's specialty questioned spreading curiously - transmit and conduct!
"Jwahn!" The car with specialty commanded sharply to rotate - revolve, turn in a circle!
This character represents troupe, asking "Twahn? Regiment?" curiously!
Picture yellow taking form - it shouts "Hwahng? Golden?" with vivid energy!
Picture extensive taking form - it shouts "Gwahng" with vivid energy!
The tree takes the shape of horizontal, shouting "Hung!" sharply!
The window stands for window, singing "Chwahng!" cheerfully!
The thread stands for general, whispering "Dzohng" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Picture verbose taking form - it sings "Jahn!" with vivid energy!
"Dahn!" The verbose hand commanded sharply to assume - carry, bear, undertake shouldering!
The strokes unite to show number, shouting "Shoo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Loh, how many floors?" The tree questioned numbers curiously - a multistory building, a watchtower!
The strokes unite to show alone, singing "Doo? Single?" cheerfully!
The body takes the shape of to belong to, whispering "Shoo" softly!
The fire stands for spoiled, shouting "Lahn!" sharply with flickering flames dancing high!
This character represents orchid, asking "Lahn? Elegant?" curiously!
"Tsohng, should we obey?" Person questioned person curiously - time to follow and accompany!
See how the thread forms vertical? It shouts "Dzohng!" sharply!
An striking symbol for identical that asks "Chee? Equal?" curiously!
"Jee!" Identical water commanded sharply to relieve - help, aid and finish!
Picture clown taking form - it whispers "Choh" with vivid energy!
Like a hand, this character means to twist and whispers "Nyoh"!
A striking symbol for lowly that sings "Bay!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show a brand, asking "Pigh? Signboard?" curiously!
See how the mouth forms appellation? It shouts "Hao!" sharply!
The heart stands for peculiar, shouting "Gwigh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Like fire, this character means crimson and shouts "Chir!"!
This character represents likewise, shouting "Yee!" sharply!
Like a tree, this character means extreme and asks "Jee? Utmost?"!
This character represents miscellaneous, asking "Dzah? Mixed?" curiously!
The mouth stands for sayeth, singing "Yueh!" cheerfully spoken through parted lips!
